verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w those|strong="H1945"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* iniquity \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w beds|strong="H4904"\w*! \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* light, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w practise|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5375"\w* \w covet|strong="H2530"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w seize|strong="H1497"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w*. \w They|strong="H5375"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, even \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w planning|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w*, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remove|strong="H4185"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w necks|strong="H6677"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w haughtily|strong="H7317"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w lament|strong="H5091"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w doleful|strong="H5093"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H5092"\w*, saying, ‘\w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w utterly|strong="H7703"\w* \w ruined|strong="H7703"\w*! \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*’s \w possession|strong="H2505"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*. Indeed \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w takes|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* assigns \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* traitors!’”

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* divides \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H1486"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

“Don’t \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w*!”—\w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w*— “Don’t \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w* about these \w things|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Disgrace|strong="H3639"\w* won’t overtake us.”

\w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* angry? \w Are|strong="H1697"\w* \w these|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*? Don’t \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w walks|strong="H1980"\w* blamelessly?”

\w But|strong="H7725"\w* lately \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w an|strong="H6965"\w* enemy. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w robe|strong="H8008"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w clothing|strong="H8008"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* those \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* without \w a|strong="H3068"\w* care, \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* women \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H8588"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*; \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* young \w children|strong="H5768"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* blessing \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H2256"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w resting|strong="H4496"\w* \w place|strong="H4496"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H2256"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2930"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* destroys, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grievous|strong="H4834"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2256"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3863"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, saying, “\w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5197"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w would|strong="H3863"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5197"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H6908"\w* \w assemble|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H6908"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w Bozrah|strong="H1223"\w*, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasture|strong="H1699"\w*. \w They|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* swarm \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w people|strong="H6908"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w breaks|strong="H6555"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H5674"\w* \w goes|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H6555"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w passes|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.
